short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enhancer/customiser for the all-in-one productivity workspace Notion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a pinned table of contents, navigation aids, customisable fonts, colours and interface elements, code block line numbers, right to left text, and more to the Notion web client.

Please note that this release is currently missing some features available in previous releases. These features will be restored as soon as possible, but as part of an internal overhaul and the Chrome extension's upgrade to manifest v3, the notion-enhancer is being rebuilt from the ground up.

For a full feature list and usage guide, check out the notion-enhancer website @ https://notion-enhancer.github.io/
